website_summaries.verdict: A simple donut pillow with an additional removable cover for more comfort and support.
pros: Solid ring features dense foam that resists squishing under the body's weight
Included cover has a ventilated mesh for better air flow and temperature control
cons: Interior foam may start to lose its ability to retain its shape after several months of use

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you are looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I do home health care and take care of a big 90 year old man who continued to get bed sores. He is somewhat mobile and was sitting in his hoveround wheelchair for hours during the day. Changing his chair to a recliner helped somewhat, but when I bought him this pillow it changed everything. His sores cleared up within a few days and he had physical relief almost instantly. He loves this pillow and I would highly recommend it. Also the company contacted me making sure I was happy with everything which is very refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Girlie Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great for labor recovery!
customer_reviews.text: Pillow came on time and as advertised. It is firmer than I expected, but it has been so helpful to use at the kitchen table and riding in the car. I got a 4th degree tear giving birth to my son, so this donut pillow has been essential during my recovery. It does have a plastic/machine smell when you open the bag, but the smell soon dissipates. I’d definitely recommend! It’s especially nice having the removable cover.
customer_reviews.author: Flygirl

customer_reviews.title: Tailbone pain no more!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first because I've tried plenty of other tailbone pain relief pillows but none offered relief or they offered relief for the first hour. I injured my tailbone earlier this year and have been searching for anything to give me relief from the pain. When you program and design for a living the time gets away from you hence why I needed a better cushion to handle those longer sitting times. Anyways this is the best pillow I've ever bought and I can say that it does offer tailbone pain relief for hours. Best cushion ever!
customer_reviews.author: foxglove1028

customer_reviews.title: Super Helpul!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cushion, so much that I got me another one for the office. I had sciatica issues since I can remember and was in the middle a painful flare up when I received it and OMG it does help. For the first time in decades I'm getting relief for my sciatic pain - along with stretching exercises. My only suggestion and reason for the 4 stars (instead of 5) is that the donut is still very visible thru the cover, I would suggest the manufacturer to make the donut in a dark color or the fabric thicker - I seat in an open space at the office and you can see it - but I don't care :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable. Not memory foam.
customer_reviews.text: The pillow was hard and it WAS NOT memory foam. It was plain I'm foam that had very little give. There was no indentation left when I stood up. The pillow just was not comfortable. I ended up returning it. The return procedure was extremely easy and convenient. All I had to do was print a return confirmation, put it in the box, and UPS picked it up from my door with the packaging label.
customer_reviews.author: MeliAnn

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product due to a tailbone fracture for an elderly relative. It is wonderful! They are super comfortable with it and we are ordering more for the car and dining chairs. I love that the cover can easily be remove for cleaning and it was shipped in a plastic bag which zips close. This is very handy as it will be sent or packed in a suitcase on occasion. We are very happy with this purchase and it was received in a timely manner. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: TinaLouise

customer_reviews.title: Take the pain and discomfort out of sitting!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea this was going to be such a high quality product. I feel the $23 price point is perfect. I will be buying more in the future. My cats love to lay on it when I am not using it as well, so we all approve. I bought this as a aid for pain and discomfort for Pudendal neuralgia pelvic floor dysfunction during a severe flare. It has turned out to be the best $23 I have spent on OTC pain relief. I highly recommend. The product was less foamy and more memory gel, which pleasantly surprised me. I would not hesitate for anyone. It allows better sitting posture as well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Faine

customer_reviews.title: Well-made Donut Pillow
customer_reviews.text: This donut pillow is exactly what I needed. It arrived early and was well packaged. It is well-made, feels very sturdy, the cover also seems to be very sturdy. It is the perfect size for what I needed. I like the fact that it came with a nice case for storing or for traveling if necessary. Very pleased with the purchase and the vendor.
customer_reviews.author: SherryW

customer_reviews.title: It REALLY DOES WHAT IT SAYS IT DOES!
customer_reviews.text: How refreshing to purchase a product and it works! My husband has had some real issues and we've tried every thing to alleviate his pain while sitting. I thought this was going to be just one more product I'd either have to return or have to 'eat the cost because I couldn't return it' ... From the first sitting, my husband was pleased. I like the versatility that you can turn the pillow either horizontally or vertically to get the most relief ... makes more sense! Packaging is great; comes with a little carry bag, so we can take it with us when we travel. WELL DONE! love and hugs, cookie
customer_reviews.author: Cookie Bretz-Smith

customer_reviews.title: The quality is GREAT! You can sit either way
customer_reviews.text: I pre-ordered this knowing I had upcoming surgery. The quality is GREAT! You can sit either way, long or short ways depending on your needs. The foam memory holds, it may be a bit too firm for me, right now, 4 days post-op, but it held me in place when I had to use it in the short car ride home! No damage on my bottom, over 30 stitches. Highly recommended, post-birth would also find this extremely useful! Back comfort as well, I can only imagine the amount of ways this can be helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Garcia

customer_reviews.title: and it has been very painful for him to sit (he also can't stand for ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband has spinal stenosis, and it has been very painful for him to sit (he also can't stand for more than a two or three minutes at a timeI), and this pillow seemed to do the trick-so I bought another one to have in another room! Working well for him so far!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Best comfort and discreet cover make this perfect for home or when out.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is disabled and needs a pillow everywhere he sits. We had bought white foam ones at the pharmacy and used the plain white cover or pillow case, but that looked so "hospital like." I bought one of these and he found that the comfort was much better, I like the dark mesh which hides that it is a donut pillow and hides stains. It is more discreet when we go out. We wound up retiring the other plain ones we bought and buying 3 more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Zimmermann

customer_reviews.title: When you need one, you can't go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.text: Nobody wants to have to use a cushion like this, but such is life. I have never had a need for one before, but I found myself pleasantly surprised. It is comfortable, lightweight and reasonably priced. I hope I won't need it for long, but while I do, I'm glad to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Victor R. Casados

customer_reviews.title: Sitting on the Donut Right Now!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect seat holds its shape and protects the sore area. Appreciate that it came with a lovely carrying case!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole or Scott

customer_reviews.title: Extended size adds comfort
customer_reviews.text: My husband has tried numerous donut pillows and this is by far the best one. It is more comfortable than other pillows on the market due to its larger size. My husband's pain level has lowered considerably due to the pillows extended size.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Mia

customer_reviews.title: i usually don't believe the crap about all of these magical supports but this actually ...
customer_reviews.text: i usually don't believe the crap about all of these magical supports but this actually worked! its kinda boney but it works great for my partner! he used to only be able to sit for maybe an hour at a time in his chair but with this he actually sat there for around 8 hours and forgot he was in his chair. no pain afterwards either.
customer_reviews.author: kmc

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I had pain on my right buttock and the dermatologist said it had the potential for a bed sore, even though I am very active. Been using cushion for about two weeks and the burning/pain is gone.
customer_reviews.author: DChance

customer_reviews.title: A Donut Pillow that works!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally I have a donut pillow that works for me. I tore my tendon in the upper hamstring and sitting on the pelvic bone region is painful. The size and feel (not too hard or too soft) of this pillow is perfect to relieve the weight on my injured tendon/hamstring while driving and sitting on a hard seat chair. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: susan m

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief/Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pillow for my Mother who is confined to a wheelchair, as she suffers from MS. She developed sores as a result of sitting so much. Since she started using this pillow, the sores are healing and she finally has relief from the pain. The size of this pillow is much larger than other brands she has tried. Thanks to the vendor who followed up to ensure 100% customer satisfaction!
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Too hard for me and the type of pain that ...
customer_reviews.text: Too hard for me and the type of pain that I have. I tried to cut a slice out of the back to see if that would help, but it didn't. I think that it is well made though and would help some people. It just didn't help me.
customer_reviews.author: sc

customer_reviews.title: ... while recovering from hamstring reattachment surgery and it worked beautifully. It fit the plane seat and the opening ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this during a trip by plane and driving while recovering from hamstring reattachment surgery and it worked beautifully. It fit the plane seat and the opening was versatile enough to place the wide or narrow sideway. Firm enough to make a difference but smooshy enough to pack.
customer_reviews.author: Shoestring

customer_reviews.title: Must have for mamas in pain
customer_reviews.text: I’m pregnant and have been experiencing tailbone pain since the beginning of my second trimester. I have to sit all day at work as I’m a dispatcher and this helps alleviate some of the pain. Hopefully the pain continues to be tolerable. I would definitely recommend this so anyone that’s backside hurts.
customer_reviews.author: kams

customer_reviews.title: my computer chair makes it worse. I found sitting on a flat chair surface ...
customer_reviews.text: I have hemorrhoids that just pain me something fierce some days. After being active all morning and I decide to sit at my computer for a few hours and work, my computer chair makes it worse. I found sitting on a flat chair surface can intensify the pain, so I decided to try this cushion. Oh, what a relief it is! I find that this is the best thing I have found yet. It offers a change of position as well as a change in pressure points on the buttocks. The cushion is firm, so it does not collapse under my 182 lbs. of weight. The cover is removable so that you can wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Ron D. M.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. I have to sit in a dialysis chair ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I have to sit in a dialysis chair for four hours and this pillow makes it so much more comfortable. Highly recommend. The carrying case makes it easier to take wherever you go.
customer_reviews.author: smiles

customer_reviews.title: It is definitely worth the price and gives tremendous relief to your back and your bottom.
customer_reviews.text: I had originally purchased this a for my husband. But when my sciatic nerve began to act up I tried it myself. I am so glad I did! I now use it when I drive or sit. I drove 4 and a 1/2 hours sitting on it and I did not have one bit of pain. I guess that's why I bought a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not firm enough
customer_reviews.text: The description states that the cushion is firm but it is not. I weight 185 pounds and I am not overweight but this thing just goes flat. I was using it as a replacement for the inflatable cushions that only seem to last for about a week before deflating. I am hoping to find something that actually works for my tailbone pain but this isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hill

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Donut!
customer_reviews.text: I fell while skating and looked up the best donut pillows out there. I read many reviews and this pillow was the best fit. It has been amazing ! It was a little weird to find the perfect way to sit on it but once you do, your tailbone and back will thank you for it. I love that it brings a breatheable cover since I have to move it from my car to my desk chair all the time; it keeps it nice and clean and without tears.
customer_reviews.author: Sharosky

customer_reviews.title: Bed sore problem solved.
customer_reviews.text: Based on reviews I was a little hesitant to order this particular type cushion; as being bed ridden I am plagued by bed sores. Boy did I luck out with this cushion. Quality, comfort, nice cover, I mean everything to make my life just a bit easier. Bed sores goodbye!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was just what I wanted. I needed one with a larger hole than most of the donut pillows, this pillow is also firm enough that when I sit on the cushion that it didn't sink down. Many of the other cushions or memory foam squished so much that they were really useless for me. The cushion is pretty firm: I don't want to say that it's overly comfortable. It does, however, help my pain problems. I wish it had a carrying handle right on the pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Had been experiencing some coccygeal discomfort from sitting on hard chair for excess periods of time. This foam donut pillow has done the trick and i am back on the mend. Firm and raised but i am able to work from it for hours at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps Pressure Sores YES
customer_reviews.text: Its outstanding for PRESSURE SORES in that area....can sustain alot of weight (500lbs). Its large as well, very wide. Easy on posture as well, no ackward sitting needed.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Firmer than some, could be firmer
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace one I returned that was too flimsy to be effective. This one is a lot better, and I'm keeping it, but I would still prefer it to be a little firmer. Another buyers might differ, depending on their situation.
customer_reviews.author: RetiredGuy

customer_reviews.title: Hemmoroid surgery!!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable even though it's firm. I'm recuperating from hemorrhoid surgery. THIS IS THE ONE To BUY. The cover helps support, so that the cheeks don't separate. It's way more comfortable sitting on this than standing. Pain goes away.
customer_reviews.author: marc

customer_reviews.title: Not firm
customer_reviews.text: Product is made of memory foam, it squishes down with weight and does not have firmness. It is supposed to aupportthe coccyx but the hole on the pillow is not positioned properly.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Great Pillow; love the case
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable pillow. It doesn't feel like sitting in a donut at all. It's lightweight and the carrying case is fantastic. I'll probably use the carrying case for other items ... it was a real bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Puddletown Sue

customer_reviews.title: This foam cushion is quite substantial and serves the purpose ...
customer_reviews.text: This foam cushion is quite substantial and serves the purpose very well. If the person you are purchasing it for is short legged they may have slight difficulty getting up onto the extra height added to the surface this cushion adds, but the protection given is definitely worth the extra effort. It should work very well for those who are mostly sedentary and have to spend much of their time in the sitting position. This will help relieve the pressure and prevent skin breakdown if used properly.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs B

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this pillow
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like this pillow. it gave me a couple hours of relief before the pain came back while sitting, and working at a desk. I am a larger woman, and the pillow size was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cover
customer_reviews.text: Foam density seems adequate but the cover binds when seated. The cover does not have the elasticity to allow needed relief of coccyx pressure, when seated. Shall try foam donut without cover to determine it's usefulness in relieving pressure on affected coccyx.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I returned it... the smell of chemical was AWFUL and I am NOT sensitive to smells
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: GREAT relief following labor and delivery
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a new mommy who'd had a rough labor and delivery. She used it extensively following the birth. She said, "I don't know how I'd have survived without it!!" Win!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: I have back issues and sitting too long can really cause a problem, but this pillow extends the time and relieves a lot of the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Kazren

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: After labor this thing saved my life. No doubt that without it the pain would have been so much worse and probably would have caused pain elsewhere from sitting on one butt cheek. Helped give me much needed relief.
customer_reviews.author: Evan & Desheya

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for tailbone pain. Soft to sit on but firm. Have tried so many cushions without relief from my back and bottom pain when sitting and this is the best. Bought a second one for my car.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon O. Wood

customer_reviews.title: I love it! It has a huge opening and keeps ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It has a huge opening and keeps me up high enough so that my body doesn't touch the chair through the hole. Since the hole is so big, it's easy to control what part of your body is in the hole. I'd recommend for anyone no matter what body part you're buying it for. I've been using it for 6 months and it hasn't flattened at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tavia Vice

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use postpartum. I used it for weeks after having the baby. I even had it in the car for the drive home from the hospital. Wish I had brought it into the hospital. It was great, a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The pillow is quite comfortable. It is firm enough to support me and ...
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is quite comfortable. It is firm enough to support me and serves also to increase the height of my seat. The only thing I would like is if the bottom had a rubberized texture to keep it from shifting when I sit down. Once seated it is fine, but I am short and have to readjust it every time I sit back down.
customer_reviews.author: Dbeckemeier

customer_reviews.title: Not firm as describe
customer_reviews.text: The quality and construction seem good, but the cushion is not firm and supportive. I couldn't use this after my pelvic floor surgery -- it didn't provide the firmness and support required. The cheap air cushion that came home with me from the hospital worked much better. No free returns, so I'm stuck with this. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: margie3693

customer_reviews.title: Broken Tailbone Pain Reliever
customer_reviews.text: I broke my tailbone on a hike. I was in minimal pain after the first day when standing or laying on my stomach. Sitting or laying on my back or side was excruciating. I'm a freelance writer, so a large part of my day is spent sitting. I was miserable. This pillow has made it possible for me to sit comfortably to work. I tried other donuts, including another form of memory foam and an inflatable. This one is much better. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria N Werner

customer_reviews.title: Great tailbone support
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mother although I was experiencing some back pain myself. I figured I'd try it out to see if this actually helps....well it was worth every penny! This cushion is a Godsend. No more tailbone pain and provides the necessary support as I sit for various periods of time. I love it so much that I actually kept this one and ordered another one for my mom!! Its a great find.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Overton

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: My mother needed a new cushion for her tailbone and she told me that she loved this because hides the donut holes(she finds it a bit embarrassing) and she said the quality was superb.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was too hard for my mom. I had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Sky

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for a few hours of sitting.
customer_reviews.text: The cushion is very comfortable and relieved my pain during dinner and most of theatre. By the end of the show my pain had increased greatly which it normally does much sooner.
customer_reviews.author: MJOE

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cushion a week after bruising my tailbone in a fall. It has made sitting more comfortable though not perfect which could be attributed more to the extent of my injury, not a product flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: It really helped me after a fall to have this to sit on. Something I can always use in the future too. Very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine

customer_reviews.title: Great for tailbone pain
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for my mother who is recovering from a car accident and she is very happy. This donut has significantly eased up the pain because there is no more direct pressure, as was promised by a neurosurgeon. She's been using it for a week and so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: akovalis

customer_reviews.title: Best post op cushion
customer_reviews.text: This was so perfect post surgery that I ended up ordering a second then a third. I have one at home, one in the car, and one at work in my office chair. With the cover, it isn't noticeable that it's a donut cushion. Before I bought this I was not able to sit.
customer_reviews.author: BETTY W

customer_reviews.title: Worked out for my surgery
customer_reviews.text: Good pillow for me. I actually sat on it with the pillow going the long way instead of side to side. The surgery I had was on my right side so the entire area fit perfectly in the middle of the pillow.
customer_reviews.author: kindlefire2

customer_reviews.title: Bigger more stable size.
customer_reviews.text: Wider than most and very comfortable. Mom loves it! Cover is breathable and easy to remove for cleaning. Better than expected!
customer_reviews.author: E. H.

customer_reviews.title: Says  super soft  on  package
customer_reviews.text: This item is advertised as being very soft .......it is not . The donut is hard and uncomfortable for me to sit on as I am recovering from femur surgery and need a soft seat . Disappointed in this product .
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hood

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Would buy
customer_reviews.text: bought it to help with compression sores on invalid mom's butt. They were almost completely healed in a couple of weeks. She continues to use it and it has prevented any re occurrence. Excellent product. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Kate in Chicago

customer_reviews.title: good for pregnancy discomfort
customer_reviews.text: I am 6 months pregnant with twins and my tush area gets extremely soar/stiff if I sit for more than 20 minutes. A friend recommend a hemorrhoid pillow so I tried this one. It works wonderfully. I just returned from a 1500 mile plus road trip and it saved me!
customer_reviews.author: Becky T.

customer_reviews.title: We now have two of these pillows; one for ...
customer_reviews.text: We now have two of these pillows; one for the house and one for the car. Much more-comfortable than a flat-surface pillow. We ordered a different cushion, but had to return it because it created too much pressure. This one seems to work, and is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine O.

customer_reviews.title: It Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh man that is SO much better! Just bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Dave

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This is so comfortable!!! When I got pregnant, right away my tailbone would bother me while sitting. This made sitting at work all day bearable.
customer_reviews.author: K. Nemanic

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad for his recliner that is not as as comfortable as his old recliner. He said it is very comfortable to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: Fallon

customer_reviews.title: Great for postpartum
customer_reviews.text: I had a 1st degree tear after giving birth and was very uncomfortable when I would sit, this has absolutely helped my pain and made it easier to sit anywhere. Glad I purchased this seat!
customer_reviews.author: samantha pagan

customer_reviews.title: ) Absolutely love it. Very comfortable and much better than a ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this donut as an office chair cushion. (Not because of any particular backside problem...) Absolutely love it. Very comfortable and much better than a normal chair cushion that is flat. The donut "hole" is just in the right place...
customer_reviews.author: ElectroSam

customer_reviews.title: Really helped as I suffered from uncomfortable condition. Was ...
customer_reviews.text: Really helped as I suffered from uncomfortable condition. Was discreet enough to use at my desk in my office daily.
customer_reviews.author: Sam.Clever

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Comfortable and High Quality
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is one of the most comfortable and durable I've had and it's because of this that I ordered a second one to use in the car. I highly recommend this product. It arrived on time, was packaged well and is of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: hobienet

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow for an elderly sister in the congregation who had fallen and fractured her pelvis, she says it helps her to sit without a lot of pain. She loves it. If needed would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: edward n.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cushion works very well for post-surgical use. The design works well, and the cover makes it more discreet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: My husband needed this after surgery and he said that it has worked wonders...
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Best seat for torn hamstring
customer_reviews.text: I have a torn hamstring. Both the orthopedic and physical therapists recommended a donut seat to alleviate pressure when I’m driving. It’s been amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Sat on this donut following treatment for psoriasis. It helped to clear up problem by taking pressure off painful areas.
customer_reviews.author: Harriet P. Mandel

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews it was hard. But it’s not. Glad I didn’t listen. It has to have a little firm to it so you don’t sink straight down. It was perfect for my setons that I had placed below. I sit a lot at work and it took a lot of pressure off my setons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pippy liked it!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my Dad who said it was to hard, but my little dog likes to sleep on it.
customer_reviews.author: she_she_kay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The pillow was delivered as advertised and is an excellent fit for our needs. The delivery was on time.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: and it is a good one if you need it
customer_reviews.text: I just had surgery, and am now beginning to sit again, and this pillow is making a huge difference for me!!! it idoes not go flat. again just starting to use it. I bought this pillow due to the reviews, and it is a good one if you need it. I like the size of it. covers my whole butt :)
customer_reviews.author: IHavAVue

customer_reviews.title: This Donut Just Flattens Out
customer_reviews.text: Not firm at all - too soft to really be useful. It is very comfortable and the oblong shape is better than round because you can adjust the orientation for best fit. But when all you want is to sit without putting ANY pressure on your sensitive area, function is a priority. This donut just flattens out.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Foam donut pillow
customer_reviews.text: The pillow looked fine and quality materials. Unfortunately, when tried, it felt uncomfortable for me. I wanted to return it, but the return is not free and the cost for shipping $7.47 , too high for an item of $18.
customer_reviews.author: wafa khalil Wafa Khalil

customer_reviews.title: Easy to transport
customer_reviews.text: Recently had to order because of a surgery. Love that it comes in its own carrying case as I will need to sit on it for a while everywhere I go.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: use a pillow instead
customer_reviews.text: Foam is way too soft for 6ft tall 230lbs. It's not much better than sitting on a couch cushion.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I’m pregnant and have had a lot of hip/tailbone and back pain this makes sitting at my desk much more comfortable
customer_reviews.author: morgan

customer_reviews.title: It's fine
customer_reviews.text: This helped my tailbone pain during my pregnancy, but it was a lot flatter than I thought it was going to be.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Emme

customer_reviews.title: great but not 4 me
customer_reviews.text: very nice donut pillow, however i must return them bc they are too firm for my needs. packaging and quality were outstanding
customer_reviews.author: Mrs g

customer_reviews.title: BabyMamma approves
customer_reviews.text: Great for pregnant people with back and round ligament pain.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Good Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Takes some getting used to, but I like it. I like that it has the cover that is flat over the hole so when I'm not sitting in my chair my coworkers can't easily see that I'm sitting on a donut.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi M.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. I have back problems for years now and im 7 months pregnant, I've had it almost a week now and it's helped me relieve pressure on my back and hips
customer_reviews.author: Adelene

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty sturdy and feels like a good support for my torso area. I’m currently pregnant and this really helps as my job requires sitting for the most part. It would not improve your pain but makes it manageable .
customer_reviews.author: Safaa

customer_reviews.title: Overweight? No problem.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a person who had an issue in the rectum area and it worked perfectly for them. They also close to 270lbs and this worked wonders for them and held up perfectly. Even after the issue was over they use it on a chair they sit in constantly. So great buy esp. for those worry about weight being an issue with others. Really helped this person and I couldn't be more to have been the one to supplied them with this in their time of need.
customer_reviews.author: BlackGirlMagic

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: The pillow felt too cheap for the price and didn't really help at all with my tailbone pain at work from my pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Nicely packaged with storage bag.
customer_reviews.text: The cushion is very comfortable and helps to relieve my lower back pain. I use it also when I sleep to keep my hips from sinking into the mattress causing stress on my back.
customer_reviews.author: railgal

customer_reviews.title: Did not help relieve pain
customer_reviews.text: I tried the donut for a day driving in and out Atlanta city limits. I am recovery from back surgery. It did not help relieve pain that I have sitting in a car. The quality was excellent and I know it has helped friends but I'm sorry that it just didn't work for my problem.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I hate writing reviews but I love your do-nut pillow!
customer_reviews.author: Alma Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great.  Makes a plain wooden chair great!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended. Worth every cent, even if you just want a comfortable place to sit and write these dopey reviews out at. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Paul Scofield

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Oh so comfy makes a big difference to my tail bone pain
customer_reviews.author: Gloria A. Zorn

customer_reviews.title: Works and well made
customer_reviews.text: The product is well made, does what is needed. Especially nice is a carrying bag.
customer_reviews.author: trvlnnancy

customer_reviews.title: Donut butt cushion!
customer_reviews.text: This is a life saver!! I broke my tail bone as a kid and now that im pregnant i often have pain there. I love that the cover is removable and washable! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Waliyah Abdullah Muhammad

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: It is very soft and helps relax the sitting position if you have back issues or hip issues or tailbone issues
customer_reviews.author: M R

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: After intensive radiation made it impossible to sit comfortably, this donut cushion gave me back the ability to sit without pain. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Down by the Sea

product_meta.title: Milliard Foam Donut Cushion Orthopedic Ring Pillow with Removable Cover, Large, 20x15 for Hemorrhoid, Coccyx, Sciatic Nerve, Pregnancy and Tailbone Pain
product_meta.description:
About the Milliard Donut
The Milliard Foam Donut Cushion provides therapeutic relief while sitting, even for prolonged periods of time. Its unique ring shape reduces pressure points and discomfort associated with coccyx injuries. It is also ideal for comfortable sitting during pregnancy and after childbirth. 
Other Uses
The cushion can also simply be used as a comfort seat cushion to enhance any chair. It helps maintain proper posture and provide stability while seated and is perfect for the home, car and office. It's designed to conform perfectly to the contours of your body for maximum comfort and support. The foam relieves discomfort, aches and fatigue for one and all. Includes a ventilated mesh cover that removes easily for machine washing. Cushion measures 20""x15""

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Removable and washable coverSupportive foam with a 3.5 densityMesh cover made of 100% polyesterDonut measures 15x20"; hole measures 3.5x8"Zipper-less closure designAir permeable mesh fabric
feature_bullets: 3d Mesh Fabric is Breathable for Maximum Airflow
Ring shape provides relief by reducing pressure points and discomfort; Helps relieve discomfort associated with coccyx injuries
Can also help maintain proper posture and provides stability while seated; Ideal for comfortable sitting during pregnancy; Perfect for home, car and office
Our firm consruction doesn't flatten, and is designed to conform perfectly to the contours of your body for maximum comfort and support that lasts
Includes a durable cover that removes easily for machine washing; Cushion measures 20"x15"
Ventilated mesh cover allows your body to breathe and it therefore does not increase your body temperature
